attributes.action: Bring in a universal public smoking ban in the future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Take the smoking ban 1 step firther and ban smoking in ALL public places. my health and comfort is being violated by people smoking in the street and in the doorways of buildings. Isolate smoking to peoples homes

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
